name: Birthday Strike
description:
A small point and click about saving jobs on your boss birthday.

Made for the Mini Jam 113 with the theme 'Final Boss' and the limitation 'Stuck in a loop'.

I've got a start, an end and an inbetween, but because it was my first time doing the art and the code, i've been ambitious and there's still a lot of missing features.

Take what you see more as a base on which I'll add details, sounds, animations, puzzle in the next days and week, in ordre to complete this little project.
